title: Riot do we have any news on Championship Riven?
body: I am so anxious to see what Riot is going to do with this skin. Does anyone know if Riot has said anything about this skin?!

replies.body:
They confirmed awhile ago that it is getting released this year for worlds.

When they made that confirmation they didnt know how but they said they would most likely do it as a bundle with all 5 championship skins.

Which makes the most sense to me personally.

This would also explain why riven is getting buffed, im willing to bet any money that they want riven played in worlds to drum up sales of the skin and an all stars game with all 5 championship skins used.

that's new...i've always found that skins get released right after champion nerfs.
and i'm not sure about this but original owners might get a border

i can almost garuntee (this is a mind twister word for me, can never spell it right and i always botch it so much that spell check doesnt know what I meant, im not illiterate i just cant spell garuntee for the life of me) that original owners will get a border.

infact hell we might get borders on all the previous championship skins since this is the first season where a full team of championship skins exist  (not counting season 5 mind you when the last skin was released)
